attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel VAT is being done to much and instead of 17.5% we are paying 35% or more due to cost of VAT at Manufacturer such as beer(Real Ale), which has duty plus VAT at production and a further 17.5% at customer level for example a pint of real ale costs £2.90p to the customer and with double VAT, deduct vAT at manufacter and purchase it would cost £1.60p and sell more.
I suggest vAT be set at 5% across the board which cause an econmic growth in British industry, and make good s cheaper than imports and hom eproduced items done by microbreweries and major brewers, therefore keeping the pub trade alive with current smoking ban which will close many pubs.
